mapper.insert:
insert /** AdmProcPnt.insert */ into ADM_PROC_PNT( PCT_NO,
PJT_ID,
BIZ_PROC_ID, PROC_PHS_ID,
ITRTN_ID,
EFRT_PCT_NO, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{pctNo},
#{pjtId},
#{bizProcId}, #{procPhsId},
#{itrtnId},
#{efrtPctNo}, #{creUsrId}, sysdate, #{updUsrId}, sysdate )
mapper.update:
update /** AdmProcPnt.update */ ADM_PROC_PNT set
PCT_NO = #{pctNo},
PJT_ID = #{pjtId},
BIZ_PROC_ID = #{bizProcId},
PROC_PHS_ID = #{procPhsId},
ITRTN_ID = #{itrtnId},
EFRT_PCT_NO = #{efrtPctNo},
upd_usr_id = #{updUsrId}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and PJT_ID = #{pjtId} and BIZ_PROC_ID = #{bizProcId} and PROC_PHS_ID = #{procPhsId} and ITRTN_ID = #{itrtnId}
